name: Clin N Pancreas Head
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).

**Note 2:**  Celiac axis and splenic nodes are classified as distant nodes for TNM 7th staging and are coded in distant metastasis.

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Hepatic
    Lateral aortic (lumbar)
    Peripancreatic, NOS:
        Anterior, NOS:
            Anterior pancreaticoduodenal
            Anterior proximal mesenteric
            Pyloric
        Inferior to the head and body of pancreas
        Posterior, NOS:
            Pericholedochal (common bile duct)
            Posterior pancreaticoduodenal
            Posterior proximal mesentery
        Superior to the head and body of pancreas
    Pyloric:
        Infrapyloric
        Retropyloric
        Suprapyloric
        Subpyloric
    Retroperitoneal
    Superior mesenteric
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record

Regional lymph node(s), NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
